alert.note: Alert for Bourbon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 9:31AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bourbon County through 1000 AM CDT... At 931 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Colony to 7 miles southwest of Bronson. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Scott, Marmaton, Bronson, Uniontown, Redfield, Mapleton, Harding, Hiattville, Petersburg, Hammond, Devon, Garland, Porterville and Xenia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
